title: Analysis of molecular dynamics simulations
objectives: Learn which analysis tools are available.
Analyse a protein and discuss the meaning behind each analysis.
key_points: Multiple analyses including timeseries, RMSD, PCA are available
Analysis tools allow a further chemical understanding of the system

workflows.name: Analysis using MDAnalysis
workflows.title: Analysis using MDAnalysis
workflows.description: Analysis of MD trajectories using MDAnalysis, generating a Ramachandran plot and various timeseries.

history.message: fix link to advanced mdanalysis workflow
